page.title: 08The Country Park Warden
page.content: The person with probably the most interesting job in our area is Gordon Lunn, usually known as 'Gordon the Warden'. We met him early on a morning so that we could ask him about the Newmillerdam Country Park which he is in charge of. He explained that he was brought up in the area and used to go poaching in the area that is now covered by the Park. When he left school he joined the army and travelled around the world for over twenty years before returning to Newmillerdam seven years ago to become Warden. The Warden's job is to manage and care for an important area of relaxation for the people of Wakefield.The woodlands must be protected since as the number of visitors increases so does the damage a few thoughtless ones may cause.
